TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RefreshSharingFolderType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

Docs.summary: The class represents a request to refresh shared data in the specified local folder.

example.para: The following code example shows you how to refresh the specified local folder with the latest data from the folder that is being shared. In this example, IdOfLocalFolder is the object that identifies the local folder that is to be refreshed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::FolderIdType ^ SharingFolderId { ExchangeWebServices::FolderIdType ^ get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::FolderIdType ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The property gets or sets a object that identifies the local folder in a sharing relationship.
Docs.value: The value of the property is a object that identifies the local folder in a sharing relationship.
